description.narrative: 31 Participants attended including leading bankers, microfinance institutions, and entrepreneurs. Moreover, 2 awareness events organized to reach 1000 participants belong to researchers, media persons, consumers, policymakers, and farmers. Creating wide level awareness on bamboo local media platform used on talk shows. During this quarter, 2 bamboo depo were supported with additional facilities in Ethiopia and Kenya.2 multi-stakeholder workshop-organized, 67 participants attended to discuss the possibility to allocate a budget for bamboo-based activities in the annual work plan of the line departments and incorporate bamboo products in the government procurement system.

One banker and financial institutions orientation workshop organized in Ethiopia for financial facility and availing bankable project. Four awareness events were organized on the occasion of world bamboo day; overall progress was 22 awareness events against the indicators of 21 events. 3 national TV video report against 6 Video/talk show; and one radio talk show organized in Kenya.
